message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. As a starting point, I'm willing to offer it to you for $950000. This is a competitive price, considering the product's value to you is $1200000. I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe it's a good starting point for further discussion.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not quite comfortable with the price you've proposed. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $900000. This is still a great deal, considering the product's value to you is $1200000. I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go a bit further and meet you at $850000. I believe this is a fair price for the product, considering its value to me is $1200000.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $850000. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $875000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to me is $800000. I hope we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $825000. I believe this is a fair price for the product, considering its value to me is $1200000.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $825000. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $850000, but only if you're willing to throw in some additional perks, such as a comprehensive warranty and priority customer support. This is my final offer.

I appreciate the additional perks you're offering, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $825000. I believe this is a fair price for the product, considering its value to me is $1200000.

I'm disappointed that we couldn't come to an agreement at this point, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $825000, but only if you're willing to sign a non-disclosure agreement and agree to a 6-month exclusivity clause. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with the additional terms. I'm willing to meet you at $825000, but I'd like to remove the non-disclosure agreement and exclusivity clause from the deal. I believe this is a fair price for the product, considering its value to me is $1200000.
